post:
Well, I haven't posted any new deals lately, simply because I was too sick the past ~2 weeks. I've desided not to waste ay more time and simply repost one of my previous offers, as many people showed great interest into it:


1.5GB of dedicated RAM
512MB of vswap (total of 2GB of RAM with the vswap included)
40GB of HDD
600GB of Bandwidth
1IP
SolusVM panel
**7$ per month - recurring, no need for coupon code
**https://liquid-solutions.biz/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=95 - Seattle
https://liquid-solutions.biz/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=96 - Lenoir

2 of the above plans were featured in our Anniversary offer as well, we've added them again, as there was huge interest in them.

And the plan bellow is new one, to celebrate our new IP pricing, allowing us to go even lower, only Seattle:

256MB dedicated RAM
128MB vSwap
20GB HDD
150GB Bandwidth
OpenVZ / SolusVM
1xIPv4
15$ per year
https://liquid-solutions.biz/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=99 – Seattle only

Our new Seattle nodes are E3 Xeon's 1270, our Lenoir node is Dual Quad core Xeon.

Test Ips:
Lenoir: 199.241.190.99
Seattle: 198.23.149.3

Also, I will soon roll out a new LA location (most likely at the begining of the following week), with Colocrossing as well. Hopefully at the same time the DNS management services will be released as well, for free for our customers, of course. :)

Test files will be provided on request.

Alexander
